sentences.en: After a bit of brainstorming, Evelyn came up with several great titles for her book.
sentences.cn: 伊夫琳左思右想了一阵之后, 终于为她的书想出了几个好名字.

sentences.en: Among the methods of scientific investigation used are analytic method, cause analysis, questionnaire and brainstorming.
sentences.cn: 科学研究的方法中使用了分析方法 、 原因分析 、 问卷调查和头脑风暴.

sentences.en: Among the methods of scientific investigation used are analytic method, cause analysis, questionnaire survey, and brainstorming.
sentences.cn: 在科学调查中所使用的方法有:条理分析, 动机分析, 问卷调查, 集体讨论.

sentences.en: Be bold by pitching your solutions to management and speaking up in meetings and brainstorming sessions.
sentences.cn: 向你的管理层大胆的提出你的解决方案,或者在会议上大声将想法说出来.

sentences.en: GS : But they are working? This isn't just brainstorming at this point?
sentences.cn: 但是他们已经在工作了么? 还是仅仅在发表自己的想法?

sentences.en: Hundreds of ideas had been tried and discarded during two years of brainstorming.
sentences.cn: 在两年的集思广益期间，已经有上百种设想方案被一一尝试又放弃。

sentences.en: It is important to start off by brainstorming what you have been asked to do.
sentences.cn: 开始之前最好是用头脑风暴的方式去问问你自己这份报告的要求.

sentences.en: Once this brainstorming stage is over , Mr Berman asks everyone to come up with product ideas.
sentences.cn: 伯曼先生说自由讨论环节结束时, 他要求每个人都提出产品创意.

sentences.en: The brainstorming process is used by an analysis team to generate what - if questions.
sentences.cn: 在集思广益的过程中所使用的分析团队产生假设的问题.

sentences.en: The facilitator asks the brainstorming group for their ideas.
sentences.cn: 主持人向脑力激荡专家小组征求意见.

sentences.en: The results of brainstorming, however, have frequently been deemed inadequate.
sentences.cn: 然而, 头脑风暴的结果常常并不如人意.

sentences.en: The women meet twice a month to brainstorm and set business goals for each other.
sentences.cn: 这些妇女们一个月聚头两次来开头脑风暴会议,为彼此设定商业目标。

sentences.en: Ward Cunningham: Wiki has a feel of brainstorming, though it's not as interactive.
sentences.cn: 坎宁安: 维基一点头脑风暴的感觉, 虽然它本身并不是交互式的.

sentences.en: We are going to do some brainstorming soon.
sentences.cn: 我们很快就要做些脑力激荡.

sentences.en: We're holding a brainstorming session on our new product next Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 下周二开集体自由讨论会,研究我们的新产品.

sentences.en: With Brainstorming, treat the view on how to solve the problem rightly.
sentences.cn: 利用脑激励法(Brainstorming),正确对待学生实验中的问题解决观.

words.tran_cn: 集思广益；头脑风暴；灵机一动
集体讨论；动脑筋；出主意
集体讨论；集思广益以寻找
集体研讨；发表独创性意见

trans.tran_cn: 集思广益以寻找；集体自由讨论（brainstorm的ing形式）
